description: Get cosy with a delicious bowl of ramen. Tuck into your warming noodle soup in just 20 minutes with this simple ramen recipe using instant noodles.
keywords: Ramen noodle soup With the lot
name: Ramen noodle soup With the lot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 260 g Nongshim Shin Ramyun Black instant noodles

recipeInstructions.text: Using a slotted spoon, carefully divide eggs and noodle mixture among bowls. Serve topped with nori sheet and flakes sachet.
